short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Zooming text without distorting the images and read it on sound

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension that helps you read a website's content better.

With HandicHelp.com's Chrome Extension you can, among other things, zoom in on the text, without making images and other elements larger, in addition you can also read the text on the website aloud.
